verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <WH6030> Vai-ya-'an Then answered בִּלְדַּ֥ד <WH1085> bil-Dad Bildad הַשֻּׁחִ֗י <WH7747> hash-shu-Chi, the Shuhite וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> vai-yo-Mar. and said

הַמְשֵׁ֣ל <WH4910> ham-Shel Dominion וָפַ֣חַד <WH6343> va-Fa-chad and fear עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo; Who עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh [are] with him he maketh שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <WH7965> Lom, peace בִּמְרוֹמָֽיו׃ <WH4791> bim-ro-Mav. in his high places

הֲיֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> ha-Yesh Is there מִ֭סְפָּר <WH4557> Mis-por any number לִגְדוּדָ֑יו <WH1416> lig-du-Dav; army וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and מִ֝֗י <WH4310> Mi, any לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not יָק֥וּם <WH6965> ya-Kum arise אוֹרֵֽהוּ׃ <WH216> o-Re-hu. his light

וּמַה־ <WH4100> u-mah- How יִּצְדַּ֣ק <WH6663> yitz-Dak be justified אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> e-Noosh How then can man עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with אֵ֑ל <WH410> 'El; God וּמַה־ <WH4100> u-mah- How יִּ֝זְכֶּ֗ה <WH2135> yiz-Keh, he be clean יְל֣וּד <WH3205> ye-Lud [that is] born אִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> 'ish-Shah. ess

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> hen If עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- even יָ֭רֵחַ <WH3394> Ya-re-ach Behold even to the moon וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo no יַאֲהִ֑יל <WH166> ya-'a-Hil; and it shineth וְ֝כוֹכָבִ֗ים <WH3556> ve-cho-cha-Vim, not yea the stars לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- no זַכּ֥וּ <WH2141> zak-Ku are not pure בְעֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> ve-'ei-Nav. in his sight

אַ֭ף <WH637> 'af How כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> e-Noosh How much less man רִמָּ֑ה <WH7415> rim-Mah; maggot וּבֶן־ <WH1121> u-ven- and the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man תּוֹלֵעָֽה׃ <WH8438> to-le-'Ah. oppressor פ Peh
